description: All agent activities are reported as 25, which is unusually uniform and may indicate a reporting error or lack of diversity in task distribution.
recommendation: Investigate the data collection process for agent activities to ensure accurate reporting. Consider implementing a mechanism to verify the diversity of tasks assigned to each agent.
